name: Unfortunatly unstable Computer Placement Simulator
description:
Your Computer is placed in a not-so smart position! Beat the game before you computer falls off the edge of the table.

Full controller support.

The Keyboard can be used for the game, even though it was not designed for it. Just use Enter and Escape for RB and LB, WASD for the left joystick, and the numbers for level select.

Note: the controls sometimes bug out when playing on the web, so download the game for the best experience.
